order-table.min-receive-desc: The minimum amount you will receive if swapping successfully
order-table.price-impact-desc: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size
order-table.swap-fee-desc: 0.3% of this swap goes to Liquidity providers as the incentives
order-table.cross-chain-fee: 0.1% fee of this swap goes to cross-chain relayer as the incentives

cancel-modal.meta: You will get <bold>{{amount}} {{tokenName}}</bold> back to your available balance.
cancel-modal.tx-fee-desc: This fee was paid to the CKB miner.

swap-modal.cross-meta: You will receive additional {{amount}} CKB given free by CrossChain Relayer once you cross chain successfully.
swap-modal.order-meta: Placing this Order will lock your additional {{amount}} CKB in the Order.
swap-modal.cross-time: This swap may take 5-15 minutes. It is necessary to wait for the confirmation of 15 blocks on the {{chain}} to ensure the security.

progress.title: Progress
progress.swap-desc: Normally your swap will complete successfully soon after step {{step}}, but if the price fluctuates above the slippage, your swap will be pending until the pool price fluctuates back to the price you submitted. You also have the option to cancel the operation if it takes too long.

common.search-by-type-hash: Search token by name or type hash
common.search-by-address: Search token by name or address

validation.lte-zero: The value must be bigger than 0
validation.invalid-number: Please fill in a valid number
validation.decimal: The value is up to {{decimal}} decimal places
validation.gt-max: The value should be less than Max
validation.ckb: Insufficient CKB balance. Please keep at least {{amount}} CKB in your wallet.
validation.confirming: Please confirm or cancel the transaction in your wallet.
validation.minimum-pay: The minimum pay amount should bigger than 4 CKB
validation.type-hash: Please try to use a valid token type hash to find token.
validation.address: Please try to use a valid token address to find token.
validation.pool-not-exist: The {{poolName}} pool does not exist. Please go to create the pool first.
